typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EMPID as string,
		EMPNAME as string,
		EMPSALARY as string,
		EMPLOCATION as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		id as string,
		name as string,
		CITY as string,
		LAPTOP as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source1, source2 join(EMPID == id,
	joinType:'inner',
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['inneroutput'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		EMPID,
		EMPNAME,
		EMPSALARY,
		EMPLOCATION,
		id,
		name,
		CITY,
		LAPTOP
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
